page.title: 20LEISURE AND RECREATION(CONT)
page.content: Popular Leisure Activities. (Recorded as number of occasions per month per family) Watching Television 30 Gardening 9 Playing Sport 9 Visiting Public House 7 Reading 15 Cinema,Theatre,Concerts. 0.25 Motoring for Pleasure 1 Most leisure is home-based or within the village. Quite a high percentage take an active part in some form of sport. Cinemas and theatres are rarely used but this may be a reflection of the isolation of the communities. Considering the attractiveness of the locality it is surprising how little motoring takes place. Video entertainment show the biggest increase.
